title: Coronavirus: The view from my window
description: Jemima Yong's pictures record the comings and goings on a patch of land outside her London home.

title: Oklahoma City bombing: The day domestic terror shook America
description: Twenty-five years ago, on 19 April, a deadly bomb attack shook America and left 168 people dead.

title: The internet has fun with the BBC News theme tune
description: Piano, dance, drums... people are sharing videos of their takes on the familiar music.

title: Coronavirus: ‘Buying a round’ to thank NHS workers
description: Social enterprise Brewgooder is helping people buy beers for those on the coronavirus front line.

title: 'Very difficult to relegate teams if season has not played out'
description: Brighton owner Tony Bloom says he cannot see how clubs can be relegated from the Premier League if the season is not completed.

title: Haney 'rejects discrimination of any kind' after 'white boy' comment
description: Devin Haney says he is not racist and rejects discrimination after saying he would "never lose to a white boy".

title: Woodhouse throws perfect nine-darter - in his kitchen
description: Luke Woodhouse throws a nine-dart finish in his kitchen on night two of the PDC Home Tour.

title: Coronavirus: Capt Tom guest of honour at Harrogate hospital opening
description: The 99-year-old will join the opening of a Nightingale hospital in Yorkshire via video link.

title: Coronavirus is a reality check, says World Rugby boss Beaumont
description: World Rugby boss Sir Bill Beaumont says he is confident a revised Nations Championship will be launched in the aftermath of the coronavirus pandemic.

title: 'Football is the punching bag' - Wright rejects Premier League criticism
description: The Premier League should not be criticised for discussing how the season should be concluded, says former England striker Ian Wright.

title: Sahar Tabar: Jailed Iranian Instagram star 'has coronavirus'
description: Sahar Tabar rose to fame over her pictures, which were said to resemble an eerie Angelina Jolie.

title: Captain Tom Moore teams up with singer Michael Ball in charity release
description: Fundraising 99-year-old veteran Captain Tom Moore and West End star Michael Ball record charity single.

title: Captain Tom Moore: How will coronavirus fundraising be spent?
description: Captain Tom Moore has raised millions for NHS charities - what will happen to the money?

title: Coronavirus: Captain Tom Moore passes £21m in NHS fundraising
description: The 99-year-old former soldier is hailed a "one-man fundraising machine" by Prince William.

title: Coronavirus: Concern over protective kit guidance change
description: There are warnings patients could be at risk if NHS staff reuse equipment or fail to wear full gowns.

title: Queen's birthday gun salute cancelled amid coronavirus outbreak
description: A Buckingham Palace official says the monarch has decided it would not be appropriate at this time.

title: Coronavirus: British Transport Police officer, 53, dies
description: Det Con John Coker leaves behind a wife and three children, British Transport Police says.

title: The youngsters who had a breakout season - how do you rank them?
description: BBC Sport picks an XI of Premier League players who have impressed that were aged 21 or younger at the start of the season.

title: England's Watkins quits NRL to return home after father contracts coronavirus
description: England's Kallum Watkins quits NRL side Gold Coast Titans and returns home after his father contracts coronavirus.

title: Coronavirus: Early prison release scheme suspended after errors
description: An administrative failure sees six low-risk inmates released by mistake, prompting a review.

title: Hotel scheme 'will cut rough sleeping after virus'
description: Giving homeless people rooms in hotels will reduce rough sleeping after coronavirus, says charity.

title: Coronavirus: President Trump defends tweets against US states' lockdowns
description: He says some measures are "too tough", but health experts warn lifting them will increase infection.

title: Coronavirus: Double warning over antibody tests
description: Experts say screening may not prove immunity from coronavirus, and Britons are warned over unproven tests.

title: The Papers: '7,500 care home deaths' and British vaccine hopes
description: Saturday's papers report a UK "breakthrough" in the search for a coronavirus vaccine.

title: Coronavirus: English councils could resort to 'extreme cost-cutting'
description: Local authorities warn their income base is "collapsing" as coronavirus pressure mounts.

title: Coronavirus: Is my lockdown drinking normal?
description: As research suggests one in five people are drinking more, a look at changing alcohol habits.
